column2: They're… uhh… good people… *Gordon scratches his neck.* Uhm… wel…
Wait, that's it? That's the entirety of your opinion?
What do you think about officer Frontz?
No, it's okay. That's all for now. Over and out.
He's a… professional. I think. He goes to see the p-p-priest often. Always trains with the s-s-soldiers, I've seen it.
I've never thought about it. *Gordon looks guilty.* I didn't know you w-w-would want to know about it.
What do you think about officer Frontz?
No, it's okay. That's all for now. Over and out.
She comes here often on business. She's f-f-fun. Jokes a lot. I t-t-told about the time when Dr Fischerman painted the cat blue, right? She was the one who gave him the p-p-paint.
Hm. Painting a cat blue… geniuses have their own quirks.
C… could be. And I can't tell you anything else about Officer F-F-Frontz.
No, it's okay. That's all for now. Over and out.
